approve.description: Approves the specified address to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's balance.

setOwner.description: Sets a new owner for the contract.

setName.description: Sets a new name for the token.

setAuthority.description: Sets a new authority for the contract.

push.description: Pushes tokens from the caller to the specified address.

pull.description: Pulls tokens from the specified address to the caller.

move.description: Moves tokens from one address to another.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender can spend on behalf of the owner.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to get the user representation of the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

stopped.description: Returns whether the contract is stopped or not.

authority.description: Returns the current authority of the contract.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

Mint.description: Emitted when new tokens are minted.

LogSetAuthority.description: Emitted when a new authority is set.

LogSetOwner.description: Emitted when a new owner is set.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

events.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.
